text:
@realDonaldTrump 2 months ago, Feb 20, neither the U.S. nor South Korea had recorded a death from the virus.

On March 20, South Korea had 100 total COVID-19 deaths and the U.S. had 150.

Today, exactly 1 month later, South Korea has a total of 236 deaths. The U.S. has passed 40,000

#FUCKTRUMP
